## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G09030](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G09030)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EAP3</u>
- **Gene Name:** ENDOPLASMIC RETICULUM-ARRESTED PEN3
- **Description:**   BTB/POZ domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2095279
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Gene Ontology:

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_101331]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Homozygotes show ER accumulation of PEN3. On a whole plant level, mutants show increased susceptibility to fungal pathogens.
